co.cask.cdap.api.worker

Interface WorkerConfigurer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DatasetConfigurer, PluginConfigurer, ProgramConfigurer

    public interface WorkerConfigurer
extends DatasetConfigurer, ProgramConfigurer, PluginConfigurer
    Interface for configuring Worker.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setInstances(int instances)
      Sets the number of instances needed for the Worker.
      void setResources(Resources resources)
      Sets the resources requirements for the the Worker.
      void useDatasets(Iterable<String> datasets)
      Deprecated. 
      Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Dataset can be requested directly through the method DatasetContext.getDataset(String) at runtime when calling WorkerContext.execute(TxRunnable).

      • Methods inherited from interface co.cask.cdap.api.ProgramConfigurer

        setDescription, setName, setProperties

      • Methods inherited from interface co.cask.cdap.api.plugin.PluginConfigurer

      • Methods inherited from interface co.cask.cdap.api.DatasetConfigurer

    • Method Detail

      • setResources

        void setResources(Resources resources)
        Sets the resources requirements for the the Worker.
        Parameters:
        resources - the requirements

      • setInstances

        void setInstances(int instances)
        Sets the number of instances needed for the Worker.
        Parameters:
        instances - number of instances, must be > 0

      • useDatasets

        @Deprecated
void useDatasets(Iterable<String> datasets)
        Deprecated. Deprecated as of 2.8.0. Dataset can be requested directly through the method DatasetContext.getDataset(String) at runtime when calling WorkerContext.execute(TxRunnable).
        Adds the names of Datasets used by the worker.
        Parameters:
        datasets - dataset names
